verses.name: Acts 14:9
verses.text: The same heard Paul speak: who stedfastly beholding him, and perceiving that he had faith to be healed,

verses.name: Acts 14:10
verses.text: Said with a loud voice, Stand upright on thy feet. And he leaped and walked.

verses.name: Acts 14:11
verses.text: And when the people saw what Paul had done, they lifted up their voices, saying in the speech of Lycaonia, The gods are come down to us in the likeness of men.

verses.name: Acts 14:12
verses.text: And they called Barnabas, Jupiter; and Paul, Mercurius, because he was the chief speaker.
